references.paper_title: SuperGlue: Learning feature matching with graph neural networks
references.reason: This paper is a highly influential work in image matching, introducing a novel learning-based approach that significantly improves matching accuracy and robustness.

references.paper_title: LOFTR: Detector-free local feature matching with transformers
references.reason: This paper presents a key advancement in image matching by proposing a transformer-based method that eliminates the need for keypoint detectors, improving efficiency and generalization.
This paper introduces a state-of-the-art dense feature matching method that achieves high accuracy and robustness, setting a new benchmark in the field.

references.paper_title: MegaDepth: Learning single-view depth prediction from internet photos
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale dataset for depth estimation, which has been crucial for training and evaluating advanced image matching models.

references.paper_title: ScanNet: Richly-annotated 3D reconstructions of indoor scenes
references.reason: This paper introduces a widely used dataset for indoor scene understanding that contains rich annotations which are valuable for training and evaluating various computer vision tasks including image matching.
